content.new:
Hi ,

I am trying to install packages which are given in the file requirements.txt but it gives an error using pip3 command (Cannot fetch index base URL https://pypi.python.org/simple/
).  I even tried manually exporting the proxy and installing the packages one by one; but nothing helped. 

Can anyone please help regarding this?
Thanks
